value.title: Facial Recognition Development In Wasps Hints At A Mystery Of Human Evolution
value.excerpt: Scientists have long wondered how prehistoric humans quickly unstuck themselves from the Stone Age and rapidly became as intellectually and socially capable as modern humans. Recent discoveries about wasps and their cognitive abilities may hold a clue.

value.title: Translating PDF documents using Amazon Translate and Amazon Textract

Since then, companies across various industries have been creating, scanning, and storing large volumes of documents in this digital format. value.title: Meet The AI Entrepreneur Preparing Underserved Students For The Future Of Work

value.title: CBP doesn’t consistently notify air travelers about facial recognition tech use, privacy: GAO
value.excerpt: Customs and Border Protection (CBP) is not consistently notifying travelers about its use of facial recognition technology or privacy options in US airports, according to the Government Accountability Office (GAO).

value.title: Yandex Self Driving Group Gets $150 Million, Will Bring Autonomous Vehicles To U.S.
value.excerpt: Yandex is not cutting ties with its former autonomous vehicle team by any means. Yandex NV is going to invest $150 million into Yandex SDG ($100 million in equity, $50 million as a convertible loan) and Yandex NV will keep an eye on the autonomous vehicle technology progress and will keep reporting Yandex SDG's results in Yandex NV's "Other Bets and Experiments" segment.
